welcome_message_body: "Welcome to beautiful Sant'Antonio Abate, known for its charming streets, delicious cuisine, and warm hospitality. We invite you to explore and immerse yourself in the enchanting culture and sights of our city. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Capodichino Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal used for low-cost carriers and seasonal flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport, but may have limited coverage in certain areas.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Pontecagnano Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Pontecagnano Airport, primarily used for charter and private flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
